title: Plan for change: User alerts on iOS for when screen capture actions are blocked
content: In an upcoming version (20.3.0) of the Intune App SDK and Intune App Wrapping Tool for iOS, support is added to alert users when a screen capture action (including recording and mirroring) is detected in a managed app. The alert is only visible to users if you have configured an app protection policy (APP) to block screen capture.
